tasks.description: Find round-trip flights from San Francisco (SFO) to Toronto (YYZ) for Jan 1, 2025 (up to one to two weeks)

tasks.name: extract_aigrant_companies
tasks.description: Extract all companies that received the AI grant and group them with their batch numbers as an array of objects. Each object should contain the company name and its corresponding batch number.

tasks.description: Extract the ECCN Code, RoHS Status, and Impedance.

tasks.name: extract_partners
tasks.description: Extract all of the partner categories on the page.

tasks.description: Extract the title and corresponding publish date of EACH AND EVERY press releases on this page. DO NOT MISS ANY PRESS RELEASES.

tasks.name: extract_snowshoeing_destinations
tasks.description: Extract all the snowshoeing regions and the names of the trails within each region.

tasks.name: google_jobs
tasks.description: Extract the following details from the job posting: application deadline, minimum qualifications (degree and years of experience), and preferred qualifications (degree and years of experience)

tasks.description: Extract the Primary exact Burner BTU of the product

tasks.description: Click on online supermarket

tasks.description: Extract the name of the goal scoring leader, their number of goals they scored, and the team they played for.

tasks.name: extract_rockauto

tasks.description: Extract ALL the news report titles and their dates.

tasks.name: extract_apartments
tasks.description: Extract all the apartment listings with their prices and their addresses.
